attributes.action: ONLY  include SAFETY features in the MOT test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please put the MOT test back to what it is supposed to be there for ie road worthiness.

Brakes, tyres, steering and (misaligned)lights. 

NOT lack of windscreen washer fluid, exhausts (apart from possible noise level), seatbelts, metal bullbars etc None of these affect the actual roadworthiness of the vehicle.

Blown bulbs are a special case. This can happen anytime. Replace the bulb. If the light THEN fails OK, but if it works, it is not an MOT failure.
